fstimage:
    Masayuki Matsumoto
        sgi image loader.
            matumot[AT]dst.nk-exa.co.jp
    Copyright (C) 1995 Masayuki Mastumoto
    Modified so that it doesn't exit on error.
    Added support for reading grayscale, rgb, and rgba images
            Mark Danks - 1998
